## AgenticTui type

Detects whether code is running inside an agentic TUI application.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type AgenticTui = "claude-code" | "cursor-agent" | "gemini-cli" | "aider" | "codex" | "cline" | "kiro-cli" | "opencode" | "github-copilot-cli" | "unknown";
```
